title: The Veil Is Torn: AD 30 to 70 Pentecost to the Destruction of Jerusalem
description: The Christians is the history of Christianity, told chronologically, epoch by epoch, century by century, beginning at Pentecost and concluding with Christians as we find ourselves in the twenty-first century. Book is 8&1/2 X 12"- no dust cover on this edition.
author: Ted Byfield
